```{r}
rideshare_ <-
  academyDatasets::rideshare %>% 
  filter(
    lubridate::as_date(timestamp) == "2018-11-26", 
    source_location == "Back Bay",
    provider_service %in% c("Lyft XL", "UberXL", "Shared", "UberPool")
    ) %>% 
  select(timestamp, provider_service, price_mean, distance_mean) %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = price_mean:distance_mean,
    names_to = "type",
    values_to = "value"
  ) %>% 
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = provider_service,
    values_from = value
  )
rideshare_
```

```{python}
import datetime
r = (rideshare
  .loc[(rideshare.timestamp.dt.date == datetime.date(2018, 11, 26)) &
       (rideshare.source_location == "Back Bay") &
       (rideshare.provider_service.isin(["Lyft XL", "UberXL", "Shared", "UberPool"]))
       ]
  .loc[:, ["timestamp", "provider_service", "price_mean", "distance_mean"]]
  .melt(id_vars=["timestamp", "provider_service"], var_name="type", value_name="value")
  .pivot(index=["timestamp", "type"], columns="provider_service", values="value")
  .reset_index()
)
```
